text.tspan: $M _{C \rightarrow B}(B) = \begin{pmatrix} \Psi_{BC}( B=0, C=1 ) \\ \Psi_{BC}( B=1, C=1 ) \end{pmatrix} = \begin{pmatrix} 1 \\ exp(\alpha) \end{pmatrix} $
$M _{A \rightarrow B}(B) = \begin{pmatrix} \Psi_{AB}( A=0, B=0 ) + \Psi_{AB}( A=1, B=0 ) \\ \Psi_{AB}( A=0, B=1 ) + \Psi_{AB}( A=1, B=1 ) \end{pmatrix}$
